0.text: Innate: Periodically, Galio's next basic attack is empowered to have an  uncancellable windup and deal 15 − 200 (based on level) (+ 100% AD) (+ 50% AP) (+ 60% bonus magic resistance) modified magic damage to the target and all enemies near them.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, Galio's next basic attack is empowered to have an uncancellable windup and deal 15 − 200 (based on level) (+ 100% AD) (+ 50% AP) (+ 60% bonus magic resistance) modified magic damage to the target and all enemies near them.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup

0.text: Active: Galio creates two windblasts 250 units to either side of him that arc out before converging to the target location, dealing magic damage to all enemies they pass through.
0.html: Active: Galio creates two windblasts 250 units to either side of him that arc out before converging to the target location, dealing magic damage to all enemies they pass through.

1.text: When the blasts meet, the gusts form a tornado that persists for 2 seconds, slowly moving forward and dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within the area. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 150 against  monsters.

1.text: Active: Galio  charges for up to 3 seconds,  slowing himself by 15%, and gaining magic damage  reduction and half of that amount as physical damage reduction; charging increases Shield of Durand's radius, damage and  taunt duration over the first 2 seconds of the channel.
1.html: Active: Galio charges for up to 3 seconds, slowing himself by 15%, and gaining magic damage reduction and half of that amount as physical damage reduction; charging increases Shield of Durand's radius, damage and taunt duration over the first 2 seconds of the channel.

0.content: 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40% (+ 5% per 100 AP) (+ 8% per 100 bonus magic resistance)

1.content: 10 / 12.5 / 15 / 17.5 / 20% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) (+ 4% per 100 bonus magic resistance)

markedPassages: charges
slowing
reduction
taunt

2.text: Shield of Durand can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or when  interrupted.
2.html: Shield of Durand can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or when interrupted.
markedPassages: interrupted

3.text: Recast: Galio refreshes the damage reduction for 2 seconds and deals magic damage to nearby enemy champions, increased by 0% − 200% (based on channel time), as well as  taunts them for 0.5 − 1.5 (based on channel time) seconds, setting their  movement speed to a static 60 for the same duration.
3.html: Recast: Galio refreshes the damage reduction for 2 seconds and deals magic damage to nearby enemy champions, increased by 0% − 200% (based on channel time), as well as taunts them for 0.5 − 1.5 (based on channel time) seconds, setting their  movement speed to a static 60 for the same duration.
markedPassages: taunts
movement speed

0.text: Active: During the cast time, Galio  steps backwards in the opposite direction. He then  dashes to the target location until he hits an enemy  champion or terrain.
0.html: Active: During the cast time, Galio steps backwards in the opposite direction. He then dashes to the target location until he hits an enemy champion or terrain.
markedPassages: steps
dashes
champion

1.text: Galio deals magic damage to enemies he passes through, reduced by 50% against non-champions, and  knocks them up for 0.75 seconds as well as  reveals them for the same duration.
1.html: Galio deals magic damage to enemies he passes through, reduced by 50% against non-champions, and knocks them up for 0.75 seconds as well as reveals them for the same duration.
markedPassages: knocks them up
reveals

2.text: Justice Punch will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Justice Punch will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Justice Punch will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Galio prepares to make an entrance,  channeling for 2.75 seconds and designating the target allied  champion's location at the time of cast as his landing spot. Additionally, he resets  Shield of Durand's passive shield for himself and grants it to all allied champions within the area for 5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Galio prepares to make an entrance, channeling for 2.75 seconds and designating the target allied champion's location at the time of cast as his landing spot. Additionally, he resets Shield of Durand's passive shield for himself and grants it to all allied champions within the area for 5 seconds.
markedPassages: channeling
champion's
Shield of Durand's

1.text: After channeling for 1.25 seconds, he gains  crowd control immunity for the remaining duration, becomes  untargetable, and leaps into the air for 0.85 seconds before  dashing to his destination over 0.25 seconds. Afterwards, he lands and becomes targetable again, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon impact,  knocking them back 100 units over 0.75 seconds, and remaining in place for 0.4 seconds.
1.html: After channeling for 1.25 seconds, he gains crowd control immunity for the remaining duration, becomes untargetable, and leaps into the air for 0.85 seconds before dashing to his destination over 0.25 seconds. Afterwards, he lands and becomes targetable again, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon impact, knocking them back 100 units over 0.75 seconds, and remaining in place for 0.4 seconds.
markedPassages: crowd control immunity
untargetable
dashing
knocking them back

abilities.concerningText: Active: Galio creates two windblasts 250 units to either side of him that arc out before converging to the target location, dealing magic damage to all enemies they pass through.

When the blasts meet, the gusts form a tornado that persists for 2 seconds, slowly moving forward and dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within the area. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 150 against  monsters.

When the blasts meet, the gusts form a tornado that persists for 2 seconds, slowly moving forward and dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within the area. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 150 against  monsters.
Passive: Galio gains Anti-Magic Bulwark, and restores it after 12 seconds without taking damage.Anti-Magic Bulwark: Gain a  shield that absorbs magic damage.

Active: Galio  charges for up to 3 seconds,  slowing himself by 15%, and gaining magic damage  reduction and half of that amount as physical damage reduction; charging increases Shield of Durand's radius, damage and  taunt duration over the first 2 seconds of the channel.

Active: Galio  charges for up to 3 seconds,  slowing himself by 15%, and gaining magic damage  reduction and half of that amount as physical damage reduction; charging increases Shield of Durand's radius, damage and  taunt duration over the first 2 seconds of the channel.

Recast: Galio refreshes the damage reduction for 2 seconds and deals magic damage to nearby enemy champions, increased by 0% − 200% (based on channel time), as well as  taunts them for 0.5 − 1.5 (based on channel time) seconds, setting their  movement speed to a static 60 for the same duration.

Recast: Galio refreshes the damage reduction for 2 seconds and deals magic damage to nearby enemy champions, increased by 0% − 200% (based on channel time), as well as  taunts them for 0.5 − 1.5 (based on channel time) seconds, setting their  movement speed to a static 60 for the same duration.
Galio deals magic damage to enemies he passes through, reduced by 50% against non-champions, and  knocks them up for 0.75 seconds as well as  reveals them for the same duration.
Galio deals magic damage to enemies he passes through, reduced by 50% against non-champions, and  knocks them up for 0.75 seconds as well as  reveals them for the same duration.

After channeling for 1.25 seconds, he gains  crowd control immunity for the remaining duration, becomes  untargetable, and leaps into the air for 0.85 seconds before  dashing to his destination over 0.25 seconds. Afterwards, he lands and becomes targetable again, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon impact,  knocking them back 100 units over 0.75 seconds, and remaining in place for 0.4 seconds.

origin: 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40% (+ 5% per 100 ap) (+ 8% per 100 bonus magic resistance)
origin.concerningText: Active: Galio  charges for up to 3 seconds,  slowing himself by 15%, and gaining magic damage  reduction and half of that amount as physical damage reduction; charging increases Shield of Durand's radius, damage and  taunt duration over the first 2 seconds of the channel.

origin: 10 / 12.5 / 15 / 17.5 / 20% (+ 2.5% per 100 ap) (+ 4% per 100 bonus magic resistance)
origin.concerningText: Active: Galio  charges for up to 3 seconds,  slowing himself by 15%, and gaining magic damage  reduction and half of that amount as physical damage reduction; charging increases Shield of Durand's radius, damage and  taunt duration over the first 2 seconds of the channel.

0.concerningText: Passive: Galio gains Anti-Magic Bulwark, and restores it after 12 seconds without taking damage.Anti-Magic Bulwark: Gain a  shield that absorbs magic damage.
